channel.title: Books on KrolTech
channel.description: Recent content in Books on KrolTech

item.title: JavaScript books, recent projects, Line rider!, Rock climbing
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: I went on a bit of a shopping spree on Amazon. Besides a few Kindle books (sci-fi, etc) I grabbed a few new JavaScript books as well: JavaScript Patterns – Stoyan Stefanov Secrets of the JavaScript Ninja – John Resig, Bear Bibeault If you are looking to utterly destroy an entire afternoon (or more), definitely check out the HTML5 version of an oldie but goodie, Free Rider HD!! (also know as Canvas Rider)
